ticket.title: Add templates to the rails generator ala rg
ticket.original-body:
Jeremy McAnally's rg plugin (http://github.com/jeremymcanally/rg/tree/master) would make a great addition to the rails generator. I'm thinking a syntax ala:
@@@ rails myapp --template my/template.rb rails myapp --template http://example.com/template.rb @@@
Depending on ruby2ruby doesn't seem like a good fit for Rails core, so we should come up with an alternative. Could be as simple as just having the methods declared as strings.
